resources.string:
Hello, my name is Anne. 

I am a Computer Science instructor and 
Android App developer. I've been 
developing Android apps for a few years now. 
I've been programming continually since the 
mid 1970's. My first programming languages 
were BASIC, Fortran 77, Pascal and Algol 60. 
I went on to study C, C++ and later Java and Python. 
My current programming language of choice is Kotlin. 
I'm studying Android app development using Kotlin 
by completing Udacity/Google developed training 
material and studying the wealth of information 
available online.
 
My long term plan is to keep abreast of the 
latest developments in Android and Kotlin so 
that I can pass on my knowledge in the form 
of educational YouTube videos on my channel at 
https://www.youtube.com/c/AnneDawson 
 
You can read about my computer science background here: 
http://www.annedawson.net/education.html
